component.name: sam_trx_to_sam_gen
component.doc: Re-maps a SAM file resulting from aligning a library of sequencing reads against a transcriptome to genomic coordinates. All reads that do not cross an exon-exon boundary by a specified minimum overlap are discarded by default.
component.author: Alexander Kanitz

input.name: INFILE_exons
input.doc: BED file of exons (genomic coordinates); exons of a given transcript have to be grouped together in ascending order of chromosome start and stop positions.

output.name: OUTFILE_print_report
output.doc: Print statistics on the number of processed, printed and discarded alignments to STDOUT.

parameter.name: _membycore
parameter.doc: Memory per core. Integer, optionally followed by one the follow suffixes: K, M, G.

parameter.name: no_strand_info
parameter.doc: Used library preparation protocol does not preserve strand information (if unset, all reads mapping to the opposite strand of annotated transcripts - i.e. the appropriate SAM flag is set - are discarded).

parameter.name: include_monoexonic
parameter.doc: Do not discard alignments against single exons (default: skip).

parameter.name: min_overlap
parameter.doc: Minimum required overlap between read and any of the exons.

parameter.name: tag
parameter.doc: Tag of the form "ZZ:Z:STRING" that is appended to the end of each line in the output file.
